text: “Ezɨ Solomon, nɨ oragh. Nɨ fogha gɨfa, Seruian otarim Joap, an arazir kurar kam, an osɨmtɨzir ekiam na ganɨngi. A Israelian mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanir faragha zuimning mɨsoghezɨ, aning areme. Kar, Nerɨn otarim Apner ko Jeterɨn otarim Amasa. A mɨdorozimɨn dughiamɨn aning mɨsoghezɨ aning aremezir puvatɨ. Bar puvatɨ. A pura gumazir kamning mɨsoghezɨ aning areme, ezɨ aningɨn osɨmtɨzim an ikiavɨra iti.
